extension.name: Conventional Commits
extension.configuration.properties.conve:
Controls whether the extension should automatically commit files.

*Enable `Settings > git.enableSmartCommit` and set `Settings > git.smartCommitChanges` to `all` to commit all changes when there are no staged changes.*

*Set `Settings > git.postCommitCommand` to `sync` to run `git.sync` after commit.*
Controls whether the extension should prompt for an gitmoji.

Treat words as line breaks.

Blank means no line breaks.
extension.sources.prompt.type.placeholde: Select the type of change that you're committing.
extension.sources.prompt.scope.placehold: Select the scope of this change.
extension.sources.prompt.scope.newItem.d: Add a workspace scope. (You can manage scopes in workspace `settings.json`.)
extension.sources.prompt.subject.placeho: Write a short, imperative tense description of the change.
extension.sources.prompt.body.placeholde: Provide a longer description of the change.
extension.sources.prompt.footer.placehol: List any breaking changes or issues closed by this change.
